data.title: The Leonardo DiCaprisun
data.statement: Leonardo DiCaprisun, the famous playboy, only dates women who are between the ages of 19 and 25. Given the age of a girl, write a program that determines if she is too young, too old, or just perfect for Leonardo DiCaprisun.

testCases.title: Test 2
testCases.testOut:
Too young
Too old
Too old

testCases.title: Test 3
testCases.testOut:
Just perfect for Leonardo DiCaprisun, 0 years left until 25
Just perfect for Leonardo DiCaprisun, 6 years left until 25

testCases.title: Validator 3

Just perfect for Leonardo DiCaprisun, 0 years left until 25

testCases.title: Test 4

Just perfect for Leonardo DiCaprisun, 1 years left until 25
Too young
Just perfect for Leonardo DiCaprisun, 6 years left until 25
Too old

Too young
Too old

data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
loop N read age:int
write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[N]] for the number of women applied for companionship.
<<Next [[N]] lines:>> integer [[age]], the age of every woman line by line.
data.outputDescription:
<<[[N]] lines:>> One of the comments as follows:
If the girl is less than 19 years old, the function should return {{Too young}}.
If the girl is older than 25 years old, the function should return {{Too old}}.
If the girl is between 19 and 25 (inclusive), the function should return {{Just perfect for Leonardo DiCaprisun, [[x]] years left until 25}} where [[x]] is the number of years she still has until she turns 25.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Leonardo DiCaprisun, the famous playboy, only dates women who are between the ages of 19 and 25. Given the age of a girl, write a program that determines if she is too young, too old, or just perfect for Leonardo DiCaprisun.
Input
Line 1: An integer N for the number of women applied for companionship.
Next N lines: integer age, the age of every woman line by line.
Output
N lines: One of the comments as follows:
If the girl is less than 19 years old, the function should return Too young.
If the girl is older than 25 years old, the function should return Too old.
If the girl is between 19 and 25 (inclusive), the function should return Just perfect for Leonardo DiCaprisun, x years left until 25 where x is the number of years she still has until she turns 25.
Constraints
0 < N < 100
1 ≤ age ≤ 100
Example
Input
1
26
Output
Too old
